long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension encourages you to only use the Instagram website for viewing past posts from those who you follow. It removes links to "Explore", "Reels", and "Threads", along with the "Stories" and "Suggested For You" sections. 
It also puts spacing between posts to encourage you to just focus on one at a time to enjoy it fully.
